TopicTitle: Need your own thread moved or locked? Post here.

Articles.Content: And like magic, it's gone.

I'd like to get my thread closed.

It didn't quite work out as planned. Mostly due to lack of attention.

I now know how Twitch Thursdays feels like.
Got it for you, windows_x_seven.

Thank you, O almighty Red Iron Crown.

May your name and your descendants' be known in the entire universe.

hi there

can someone please move my SigmaBinary thread from the "Add-On In development" forum to the "Add-On Releases" forum?

and remove the poll from it as well

thank you

link: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127820

I've moved it, but an admin is needed to axe your poll. Hopefully one will be along shortly.

Edit: Looks like one of them got it.

Edited August 25, 2015 by Red Iron Crown

I've moved it, but an admin is needed to axe your poll. Hopefully one will be along shortly.

ok thank you

Dearest Mods/Admins,

can you remove the poll from this thread please?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127413-WIP-1-0-4-Kerbal-Planetary-Base-Systems-v0-2-2-Update-25-8-2015

thanks and best regards,

Nils
Of course, it's done

Just want this gone, can you delete it or remove the posts then delete it.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/131168-Modding-Tutorial-Collection-%28Videos%29
There you go.

So, a while back, I made a terrible whine thread about my problems. I learned my lessons now and want one of you guys to close this piece of space junk. I'm feeling very bad about this thread, so please do it . Here's the link.
Done.
Would it be possible to have a poll option changed? Thanks. That is, the name of a option changed.

Poll deleted.

Thanks!

Oh higher and more powerful Moderates, please action and remove this poll that this lowly mod can only close!!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128879-Eve-Order-Zero-a-KSP-Graphic-Novel-%28CH4-Pg2-The-I-in-IVA-is-for-Interrogation-%29?p=2178149&viewfull=1#post2178149

Thanks! There's no hurry on the poll, I trust at least one mod reads the funny papers and will get to it when he or she can
I have closed the poll, we need higher up mods to remove polls, please do not trust on magic powers, the Squad supply of pixie dust is limited, instead we have a whole thread devoted to this kind of thing..

Ill put your request in there and a higher mod might come alone and fulfill your wish upon a star.

Oh higher and more powerful Moderates, please action and remove this poll that this lowly mod can only close!!
